de.sciss.jcollider
Class TrigControl

java.lang.Object
  de.sciss.jcollider.UGen
      de.sciss.jcollider.Control
          de.sciss.jcollider.TrigControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, GraphElem
public class TrigControl
extends Control

Class for the TrigControl UGen. This class is recognized by SynthDef in the building process. For the sake of clarity, trigger control names should begin with a small 't' letter, though this is not obligatory.

For details, refer to the Control class.

Version:
0.25, 15-Oct-05
Author:
Hanns Holger Rutz
See Also:
Control
